#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
string s;
int pallindrome()
{
	int n=s.length();
	int i=0,j=n-1;
	while(i<=j)
	{
		if(s[i] != s[j])
		{
			return 0;
		}
		i++;
		j--;
	}
	return 1;
}
int pangram()
{
	int h[30];
	memset(h,0,sizeof(h));
	for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++)
	{
		h[s[i]-'a']++;
	}
	for(int i=0;i<26;i++)
	{
		if(h[i]==0)
			return 0;
	}
	return 1;
}
int main()
{
	ll t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		s.clear();
		cin>>s;
		int pallin=pallindrome();
		int pan=pangram();
		if(pallin && pan)
			cout<<"palingram"<<endl;
		else if(pallin==1)
			cout<<"palindrome"<<endl;
		else if(pan==1)
			cout<<"pangram"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"none"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
